https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qUAEycamwpL22UEvtZvbknpmE1e.jpg When two guys get a hold of a camera from a debt, they decide to make a horror movie since most of them are cheesy and cheap anyways. They know nothing about special effects or make-up so why not just kill people for real while filming their movie? American Scream King
